cast.name: 基顿·奈杰尔·库克 Keaton Nigel Cooke

this_title: Norman Lear: Just Another Version of You
trans_title: 诺曼·李尔：只是另一个你
introduction: How did a poor Jewish kid from Connecticut bring us Archie Bunker and become one of the most successful television producers ever? Norman Lear brought provocative subjects like war, poverty, and prejudice into 120 million homes every week. He proved that social change was possible through an unlikely prism: laughter. World Premiere. DAY ONE FILM
chinese_title: 诺曼·李尔：只是另一个你
foreign_title: Norman Lear: Just Another Version of You
